nodes.text: Grand General was a senior rank within the Imperial Army of the Galactic Empire. Following the Battle of Yavin, General Cassio Tagge was promoted to the position by Emperor Palpatine and given overall command of the Imperial Military as well as authority over the Sith Lord Darth Vader. Also during the Imperial Era, the Imperial officer Ormeddon had the rank of Grand General. In the tail end of the Galactic Civil War, Kenner Loring held the rank, though Grand Admiral Rae Sloane was among several who always had wondered why Loring was made grand general instead of Hodnar Borrum. A Grand General had the authority to issue the status of a most wanted bounty.

The rank of Grand General first appeared in Star Wars: Force Commander, a 2000 Star Wars Legends video game. It became canon when it appeared in Darth Vader 2, a comic book written by Kieron Gillen and published in 2015. Holocron continuity database keeper Leland Chee was the one who came up with giving the Grand General rank to Cassio Tagge in Gillen's comic.
